name: 1v1 Battles
description:
1v1 Battles is a PVP Game where two players share one computer.

In order to play, one person uses W and S to move, Space for sheild and E for emote.

Pretty fun with other people!

If you use the downloadable version, you gain access to Snapshots and the Wick Editor Code Files

Special thanks to:

Quinn G.

Mason D.

Aiden T.

myself
